Uses of KltCornerIntensity in boofcv.alg.feature.detect.intensity.impl
 

Classes in boofcv.alg.feature.detect.intensity.impl that implement KltCornerIntensity
 class ImplKltCorner_F32
           Implementation of KltCornerIntensity based off of ImplSsdCorner_F32.
 class ImplKltCorner_S16
           Implementation of KltCornerIntensity based off of ImplSsdCornerNaive.
 class ImplKltCornerWeighted_F32
           Implementation of KltCornerIntensity that samples pixels using a Gaussian distribution based off of ImplSsdCornerWeighted_F32.
 class ImplKltCornerWeighted_S16
           Implementation of KltCornerIntensity that samples pixels using a Gaussian distribution based off of ImplSsdCornerWeighted_F32.
 class ImplSsdCornerNaive<T extends ImageSingleBand>
          Naive implementation of KltCornerIntensity which performs computations in a straight forward but inefficient manor.
 

Uses of KltCornerIntensity in boofcv.factory.feature.detect.intensity
 

Methods in boofcv.factory.feature.detect.intensity that return KltCornerIntensity
static
<D extends ImageSingleBand>
KltCornerIntensity<D>
FactoryIntensityPointAlg.klt(int windowRadius, boolean weighted, java.lang.Class<D> derivType)
          Common interface for creating a KltCornerIntensity from different image types.
